messages.content: what are the first 10 prime numbers?

The first 10 prime numbers are:

2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 23, and 29.
write a python program to print 99 bottles of beer

Here's a simple Python program to print the lyrics for the "99 Bottles of Beer" song:

```python
for i in range(99, 0, -1):
    if i > 1:
        print(f"{i} bottles of beer on the wall, {i} bottles of beer.")
        print(f"Take one down and pass it around, {i - 1} bottles of beer on the wall.\n")
    elif i == 1:
        print(f"{i} bottle of beer on the wall, {i} bottle of beer.")
        print("Take one down and pass it around, no more bottles of beer on the wall.\n")

print("No more bottles of beer on the wall, no more bottles of beer.")
print("Go to the store and buy some more, 99 bottles of beer on the wall.")
```

You can copy and paste this code into a Python environment to run it.
